channel.title: Am I sharing from Safari ios 15b6 properly?
channel.description: It seems that when I have a selection from safari and us the share, I'm only getting the text but not the title or URL from the web page. Is this a problem with Safari, drafts (I'm on the beta for that too), or user error?

item.title: Am I sharing from Safari ios 15b6 properly?
item.dc:creator: agiletortoise
item.description:
If you use the “Share” option in the black menu over the text selection, the system only shares the text itself. You need to use the share button in the toolbar to get the additional information.
